Company Name: NovaTech Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Document: Leave and Attendance Policy
Version: 1.0

1. Working Hours
- Standard working hours are 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM, Monday to Friday.
- Employees are expected to work 8 hours per day excluding lunch break.

2. Casual Leave (CL)
- Employees are entitled to 10 days of Casual Leave per calendar year.
- Casual Leave cannot be carried forward to the next year.
- A maximum of 3 consecutive days of Casual Leave can be taken at a time.

3. Sick Leave (SL)
- Employees are entitled to 8 days of Sick Leave per calendar year.
- Sick Leave can be clubbed with Casual Leave in special cases, subject to manager approval.
- For absence of more than 2 consecutive days, a medical certificate may be required.

4. Earned Leave (EL)
- Employees receive 15 days of Earned Leave per year.
- Earned Leave can be carried forward up to a maximum balance of 45 days.
- Encashment of Earned Leave is allowed at the time of resignation as per company pol

5. Work From Home (WFH)
- Employees may avail up to 4 WFH days per month with prior manager approval.
- WFH is not allowed on mandatory in-office days such as the first working day of the month or important review meetings.

6. Probation and Notice Period
- The standard probation period is 6 months from the date of joining.
- Notice period during probation is 15 days.
- Notice period after confirmation is 60 days.

7. Holidays
- The company follows 10 public holidays as per the yearly holiday calendar.
- Optional festival holidays may be availed by prior approval and will be adjusted against Casual Leave.

8. Late Coming and Early Leaving
- Up to 3 instances of late coming per month are allowed (delay of up to 15 minutes).
- Repeated late coming or early leaving may

adjusted against Casual Leave.

8. Late Coming and Early Leaving
- Up to 3 instances of late coming per month are allowed (delay of up to 15 minutes).
- Repeated late coming or early leaving may be adjusted against leave or may lead to disciplinary action.

For any clarification or special cases, employees are requested to contact the HR department.
